item.title: my serverless blog is now life
item.description: following the instructions on https://www.control-alt-del.org/post/serverless-blog-howto/ and fixing an issue in the config.yml the serverless blog is now life. The CMS Back-End The CMS backend with workflow and edit functions resides in three files: A single javascript file which incorporates every functionality which is needed A single configuration file config.yml which keeps all config data that is needed by the javascript CMS A single HTML which invokes the javascript file and which could also add custom widgets to extend the base functionality, e.
